thread.title: Ivan Rakitic left out of Barcelona squad ahead of move? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers
thread.title_full: Ivan Rakitic left out of Barcelona squad ahead of move? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers

author: Football Spy
title: Ivan Rakitic left out of Barcelona squad ahead of move? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers
text:
Sport Ivan Rakitic left out of Barcelona squad ahead of move? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers PLUS: Patrice Evra could be on his way out of Juventus with club CEO Giuseppe Marotta revealing the Frenchman is "thinking about his future" Share Ivan Rakitic was left out of Barcelona's squad again on Sunday (Photo: Reuters) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Ivan Rakitic was yet again left out of Barcelona's match-day squad as rumours persist he will swap the Nou Camp for Manchester City. 
The Croatian midfielder does not appear to be injured but played no part in Barcelona's 1-1 draw with Villarreal. 
Various publications are reporting Rakitic is on his way to the Etihad, although the player's representatives have denied that is the case. 
Here are the rest of Monday's transfer stories... Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Arsene Wenger reveals plans for January transfer window Share this video Watch Next Stories from the Monday's Daily Mirror 
Southampton are eyeing Liverpool defender Mamadou Sakho to replace their want-away captain Jose Fonte. Southampton are eyeing Sakho (Photo: David Price/Arsenal FC via Getty Images) 
Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho has claimed he remains open to keeping Memphis Depay at Old Trafford - but won’t stand in his way if he desires a move. Midfield misfit Depay has been strongly linked with a move to Everton. 
Arsene Wenger has revealed he had virtually banned Danny Welbeck from hanging round both the Emirates stadium and the training ground for long spells during the eight-month absence with a knee injury that finally ended on Saturday to stop him getting too disheartened. Danny Welbeck has returned after eight months out injured (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
Mauricio Pochettino dedicated Tottenham’s FA Cup win over Aston Villa to proud dad Harry Kane. Spurs striker Kane was given the day off to be with his partner Kate Goodland, who gave birth to a baby girl, Ivy Jane, on Sunday morning. Gossip from other newspapers and websites Patrice Evra could be set to leave Juventus (Photo: AFP) 
Patrice Evra could be on his way out of Juventus with club CEO Giuseppe Marotta revealing the Frenchman is "thinking about his future". (Sky Italia) 
Inter Milan are plotting an audacious bid for Barcelona superstar Lionel Messi , whose contract at the Nou Camp expires in 2018. (Mundo Deportivo) Middlesbrough's David Nugent could be on his way to Derby (Photo: Reuters) 
Arsenal have denied they made a £55million bid for Torino striker Andrea Belotti . (Sky Italia) 
Derby County are close to securing a deal for Middlesbrough forward Dave Nugent , who is expected to cost around £2million. (Derby Telegraph) Like us on Facebook
